title: What is the best cover band of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only 1 band that I know of whose live covers included but are not limited to: Traditional songsCannon’s Jug Stompersthe Memphis Jug BandHowlin WolfBlind Lemon JeffersonMuddy WatersWillie DixonLightnin’ HopkinsBlind Willie JohnsonRev Gary DavisChuck Berrythe Everly BrothersMarty RobbinsHank WilliamsMerle HaggardLoretta LynnDolly PartonCharlie MonroeBill MonroeElizabeth CottonBonnie DobsonBob DylanJames BrownWilson PicketWanda JacksonSpencer Davies Groupthe Beatlesthe Rolling Stonesthe WhoPaul McCartneySmoky RobinsonMarvin GayeBobby “Blue” BlandPaul SimonThemthe MetersJohnny Otisthe Beachboysthe SafarisMiles Davis& Jerry Garcia was in it. I would guess the second best would be String Cheese.

What is the best cover band of all time? Matthew Sweet and Susanna Hoffs have released a series of albums called Under the Covers with truly superb cover versions of scores of songs. Here are a few examples: “And Your Bird Can Sing”  “Cinnamon Girl”  “You’re So Vain”
